definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: Additionally, we have to beware of and be discreet on the changing world.
sentences.chinese: 另外，就是對無常世界的戒懼謹慎。

sentences.english: He drifts outside all year round, afraid of nobody.
sentences.chinese: 他常年在外飄蕩，對什麼人都毫不戒懼。

sentences.english: The bad weather kept the driver on his toes.
sentences.chinese: 惡劣的天氣狀況使那位駕駛謹慎戒懼。
